pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Projects/Plasma/Tokamak3" - KDE TechBase
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {8535=The third Tokamak Plasma Meeting will take place in Randa, Switzerland on August 28 to September 5, 2009., 10597=And there is still the possibility for a tent ;-). But, and that's very important in general, take warm clothes with you. We are on 1440 meters over sea!}
textBeforeTable: Participants And don't forget your walking shoes. What about a Plasma BoF near a glacier ;-). Hiking The track from Visp to Randa is frequented by a very famous train: the Glacier Express which is known as slowest fast train of the world ;-). Special train from Visp By train via Visp (change the train there). Duration: atm unknown. Still investigating. Airport Milano Malpensa -> Randa By train via Visp (change the train there). Duration: 3 and a half hours. Airport Geneva -> Randa By train via Zurich and Visp (change the train there). Duration: 3 hours and something. Airport Zurich -> Randa From these airports you'll take the trains to reach Randa (which takes approx. 3 hours). Information about the train schedules can be found on the webpage of the Swiss federal railways SFR. Milano Malpensa, Italy Geneva, Switzerland Zurich, Switzerland Randa and Switzerland is in the middle of Europe and as this reachable from several directions. There are three possible airports: Travelling In Switzerland we have our own connectors. Please don't forget to bring some adapters. I'll organize some myself. Furthermore there should be
textAfterTable: Accomodation possibilites: 1 = single room 2 = double room x = several people in the same room a = small appartement t = tent u = under the roof n = no preference Topics Day 1 Presentations Introduction & State of the Plasma: Aaron Seigo Netbook: Artur (MoRpHeUz) and Marco (notmart) Interfacing with interfaces: Ivan Development Topics ZUI: harmonizing activities and virtual desktops (or lack thereof ;) Netbook * UI for search and launch containment * Issues with kwin (full screen for example) * User experience: social containment ? * Special plasmoids regarding user experience * Fix of existing plasmoids * Newspaper scrolling and other potential performance issues on netbooks Party?!? Even if Switzerland is quite expensive and Zermatt more than ever I want to show you this special village at night guided by some friends. I don't know if we find a karaoke bar ;-). Special things A friend of mine is right now building his new house and as he's an eletrical engineer he wants to automate his house. I told him about Plasma and he's very interested about the interface. He tries to be there these days so what about
